text: Bornite is an ore of copper. It is made of copper and iron sulfides. It has the chemical formula . It contains more copper and less iron than chalcopyrite. It looks like chalcopyrite. The two are both sometimes called "peacock color" or "peacock ore" because of their colourful tarnish. == Sources == Category:Copper minerals Category:Iron minerals Category:Sulfide minerals Category:Ores
title: Bornite
